NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 IDAEA: I am surprised to see you here today, Pye. I did not think you would be remotely interested in a test concerning the safety of our clan and the star system. 2 1 PYE: Must we fight again on such a momentous day, Idaea? 3 2 PYE: Let us enjoy the stars while we wait. In silence. 4 3 IDAEA: ..I apologize, Pye. That statement was uncalled for. 5 4 PYE: Recall my promise to you, Idaea; I swore to you I would only support this project if I were certain it would not cause destruction. 6 5 IDAEA: Your stance seems to fluctuate from time to time, in my defense. 7 6 IDAEA: Nevertheless, it appears that our interests are aligned for today. 8 7 IDAEA: Our destination aligns above us. 9 8 IDAEA: Come, Pye: The Deep Storm Station awaits! GD Tower R2 9
